title: Afghanistan crisis: G20 leaders pledge to avert economic catastrophe
content:
1. Afghanistan crisis: G20 leaders pledge to avert economic catastrophe  BBC News
  2. Watch: How PM Modi asked the world to unite in response to Afghanistan becoming terror hub  Hindustan Times
  3. G20 pledges money, demands humanitarian access to Afghans  WHIO Radio
